website_summaries.verdict: An attractive watch with a few concerns but also some handy features made by a top brand in timepieces. If you like a vintage look and digital display, this one is for you.
pros: Stands out for the throw-back design that features digital readout with time, day, and date
Has an illuminating button and alarm
cons: Though water-resistant, you can't submerge it,and moisture exposure could cause the gold finish to fade over time
Some authenticity concerns and "lemons" have been noted

customer_reviews.title: FAKE CASIO – NOT ACTUAL PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I received this watch and was excited to give this to my husband as a gift. Come time to open the gift, we received a watch that was not described in the packaging it arrived in. The watch didn't fit the display holder is came from and instruction that were included were for a different watch brand. My husband took it to a watch shop and they confirmed the watch was a knock off. Band broke multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: RevengeLover

customer_reviews.title: Way too small and of questionable origin
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it is a lady's watch. Apparently not. Really small. I have no idea what kind of midgets are displaying this on their arms :) as it looks awfully large on pictures. Either we don't have the same watch or those guys are XS people. I am 6'5" 250 lb and it looks miniature on me. Also it looks cheap af. I remember Casios, they had a weight and the better look, this looks so inferior, makes me wonder if it is fake. Most likely. So hope this helps...
customer_reviews.author: FauxStar

customer_reviews.title: Not the Casio I know.
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Casio watches for over 40 years and this watch just doesn't match up to the quality and performance I had anticipated. It just didn't look right on my wrist and the dial was difficult to read. I gave to the local Thrift store.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Franks

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy! Must have if you like to collect watches!
customer_reviews.text: Wow I'm impressed I just got this watch today and I like it fits perfect on my wrist, it's very fashionable and goes good with any type of clothing. It's so light and stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Huerta

customer_reviews.title: Watch working so far, band is lighter weight and not as quality as it could be
customer_reviews.text: Watch works fine so far, but the band is not as hefty/solid as a previous one I purchased maybe a year ago, so not sure how it will hold up. I'm looking for the gold rubbing off and so far it has not but I've only had this one a couple weeks; the one I bought a year ago is still very nice with only a little gold color rubbing off on the back side of the wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little gold watch that gets tons of compliments
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little gold watch that gets tons of compliments. I wear it when I want to be an ironic baller. Has all the basic functions you'd expect from a digital watch. Feels fairly cheap, and the gold will wear off on the band where the other end overlaps it. Really can't complain though because it didn't cost a fortune and looks very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, accurate, stylish
customer_reviews.text: What more could you want from a watch? Although I don't wear it particularly hard, I do wear it every day, and so far it's held up from every angle despite some significant bumps here and there. The light is nice and bright, it's easy to adjust (both the time and the fit), and the features I use - namely the stopwatch - work pretty well. So happy that it includes the date (day only, which is fine) and day of the week, too. My only complaint is that the stopwatch doesn't count hours, it just resets to 00:00.00 after an hour. Even if it meant losing the milliseconds, I'd be okay with that.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Werner

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Ordering Member's Only jacket (maroon) and knockoff Porsche folding sunglasses. And a pair of Capezio's! A bit smaller than expected. Picture is next to G-Shock GXW-56BB-1JF (with aftermarket bullbar). Watch and packaging appears to be authentic. Purchased from United Technology Group. Casio calculator watch is next.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: The color of the watch is absolutely beautiful. My boyfriend loves it and wears it often. He got a gold tie clip and this watch coordinates perfectly with it and looks very dressy and professional. The watch itself works really well and he has no complaints about it. The only thing is that adjusting the size is difficult. We had to watch a few YouTube videos to alter the size. Overall, great product and can't go wrong with Casio!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Not a Men's watch. Super tiny
customer_reviews.text: This definitely is not a Men's watch. Maybe it's a boys watch. The band didn't even fit around my wrist. The face of the watch is very small likes a women's face. The band was very thin as well. I was looking forward to getting this in the mail. Now I'm just disappointed. One more set back of ordering things in the mail
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Watch does not work
customer_reviews.text: The watch is super cute but what's the point of having a watch that doesn't tell time ? It malfunctioned a couple days after I got it . Whenever I'd reset the time and go back to look at it a couple hours later it will be completely off . It just randomly resets to 12 noon . My brother bought the same watch a couple years ago and he told me the exact same thing happened to his . I expect more from Casio .
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This came missing part of the band. I sent it back for an exchange. The second time around my husband forgot to take it off while taking a shower. It immediately stop working. It says big on the face of the watch "water resistance. " so dissapointed hopefully the warranty I got works.
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great product with cheap price!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great on my look and other people look too! The only thing is it is really light weight so it feels like it's made out of the cheap materials. Overall, nice watch to wear with casual outfit
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Jung

customer_reviews.title: and it keeps excellent time. Instruction manual for setting up the watch ...
customer_reviews.text: Watch is attractive, and it keeps excellent time. Instruction manual for setting up the watch functions is very good; it meets the reader where he/she is. My only negative comment is about adjusting the clasp location on the metal wrist band. There are no instructions in the manual for this. However, close examination of the clasp itself revealed a tiny arrow. With the aid of the small blade of a pocket knife, I was able to lift the clasp at the arrow and re-position it to fit my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: RCWilde

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Fake merchandise. Do not order this item. My watch was fake and not much is done to regulate counterfeits.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gidt for someone else. Dont know if she like it but it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Mayerling E

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, even for Casio
customer_reviews.text: I knew what I was buying when I got this, so bear that in mind as I complain. I had purchased the silver version of this for my daughter. It was about $15 and came in Casio case/box. She wanted this gold one for her birthday. This one does not come in a box, and the gold color does not justify the extra $30 for the same watch. It's just not a good deal for the money. I would not have bought it if It had not been wanted as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: M. Finlay

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected. Been doing good for months now. Lighter weight then I thought it would be. Super easy to adjust length for any wrist size. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Ok but a lot of plastic
customer_reviews.text: Watch works fine and looks ok but a lot of plastic - this is a retro watch of sorts though the original was metal.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B

customer_reviews.title: An affordable staple
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Looks great and can wear it with anything, but I wouldn’t wear it with anything more formal than business casual attire.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: I was gonna get the women's one just because it's ...
customer_reviews.text: I was gonna get the women's one just because it's way cheaper but people said the size was really small so I didn't. Anyways a picture speak more than a 1000 word so here you go!
customer_reviews.author: Verdi Kapuku

customer_reviews.title: Best Watch Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is an Old Skool playas watch... Forget a Rolex or Movado all you need is a gold Casio to let people know you dont give a F.....
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Gold finish doesn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: The watch is stylish, but the gold finish started rubbing off on the underside of the wrist from day 1. I still wear it because it's not too noticeable, and the watch works well, but I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Small, pulls arm hair, but looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is basically a regular Casio watch with a gold finish. If you're looking to put some bling on your wrist without breaking the bank, this might do the trick. Mind you that the FACE of the watch is NOT that big. It looks kind of small on my wrist as I am 220 lbs. Otherwise if you have a smaller build it might work better for you. If you're a guy with hairy arms the band will pull your hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My New favorite watch !
customer_reviews.text: One of the best looking and best functioning watches you can buy for the price . Reputable company (Casio) makes great products
customer_reviews.author: GABEM3

customer_reviews.title: This product came in a very nicely packed box
customer_reviews.text: This product came in a very nicely packed box, with a Casio case inside that held the watch very secure. It also came with the little watch manual. I would highly recommend this product and the entire buying process was very professional - Great product!
customer_reviews.author: wepatx

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Inexpensive Watch
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing the watch intermittently for about 3 weeks now. I have large wrists and the watch fits well. It was easy enough to set up and looks good. It does look a little small on big wrists and it is unexpectedly lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Brett L.

customer_reviews.title: Old school, retro fun!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it, he is 15 and wished he was born in the 70''s- 80's He really likes it, although it does have "indiGlow" instead of that old dim light they used to have, but the feel is retro.
customer_reviews.author: CARLO ROMANILLOS

customer_reviews.title: Everything perfect condition. Watch didn't come in a box but ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything perfect condition . Watch didn't come in a box but then again who needs the box . Shipping was super fast took about 2-3 days if thats . Watch was a tad big but i have little wrist . Excellent vintage watch ; easy set up . Love Love Love . Only reason i didn't give it 5 stars is pricing because when you think about for 30+ dollars plus shipping and handling if you're not getting the entire authentic packaging what are you paying for but all and all it's online shopping very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Keonna Gray

customer_reviews.title: Really nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch, I bought it as a gift for my teen aged grandchild and it was a big hit. It was a little big so a few links had to come out but it's beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Grace B.

customer_reviews.title: I love love love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this watch. I used to have the basic black plastic one before this one. I still use my black one for work because I don't want to scratch this one up (even though I already did on the side a little when I banged my hand accidentally against a door handle so BE CAREFUL). I just had to look up a youtube video to figure out how to adjust the clasp but its hella easy to do that. I've gotten many many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loose clasp
customer_reviews.text: The clasp was not secure and it fell off, had it for all of 2 days. Not worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: Wtf
customer_reviews.text: Clasp doesn't stay closed. Hard to adjust. Feels cheap, starting to lose color on one side already

customer_reviews.title: Love it

customer_reviews.title: Peeled off after a month of use! Really bad quality!
customer_reviews.text: Peeled off after a month of use! Really bad quality!

customer_reviews.title: For 40 bucks, it's not a bad watch.
customer_reviews.text: It's a cool watch, has alarm functions and has a button for glowing in the dark. Some of the gold plating scratches off over time though, but that's to be expected.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality and does not have the fine finish you would expect.

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that it is adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it is adjustable. I've been wearing Apple Watch so it made a big difference in term of feeling having it on. I hope the color last for a long time though

customer_reviews.title: fun cheap retro watch. great to up the look for summer
customer_reviews.text: good overall retro watch. the gold plating is a but light so if you hit tap something metal or brick then the gold will scrape. I got a big gash within the first 5 days and i was like ugh. For the price I can't complain. I wear this watch when i don't want to wear my more expensive watch in parts of NYC that I don't feel 100% comfy. Happy with buy

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch, I get compliments on it all the time! Love that it has the blue light and can beep on the hour. really water resistant. slight scratches, especially on the bottom side but i have a desk job so it's constantly being rubbed against a flat surface. i want to buy the silver one too. i absolutely love this watch! great for gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Looks great with sooo many fits though
customer_reviews.text: This watch is so simple and solid. Most versatile watch I have with the caveat that its not waterproof, so I always have to be careful about that. Looks great with sooo many fits though.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Such a good watch for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I got so many compliments on this watch! Seems to strike a perfect balance between casual and professional as I could wear this daily with normal street wear outfits and then have a suit on and it still look amazin!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch as a gift for my boyfriend, because he loves Casio watches. He loves it and has gotten a lot of compliments on it. It definitely has that old school cool feel and look. I have zero complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight
customer_reviews.text: Lighter than expected, even thoufht it might be fake, but turns out it is 100% authentic and works great

customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking watch! great price point and durable. I wear this everyday as I need a reliable watch that also looks cool!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I have been eyeing this watch forever now and I finally decided to get it! Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Best watch brand
customer_reviews.text: My favorite watch!! Casio never fails me, this watch looks good with anything I wear
customer_reviews.author: Jerrell

customer_reviews.title: It Serves It's Purpose
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to add a vintage gold Casio watch to my watch collection for sometime now, so I finally decided to purchase this one for starters. Simple, not too big nor too small, easy to adjust the time/date, and even has a light built-in. If you're looking for a watch that isn't very flashy, yet stills shows a sense of style, I would invest in this one here.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn O’Shea

customer_reviews.title: Nice Stylish Watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for my teenage daughter as a gift and she loves it. This watch is definitely more for style than durability, as it is very light weight, and the face could easily be scratched. Overall though, it's a classic style that she can pair with multiple outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan K.

customer_reviews.title: Watch stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: The watch worked when it arrived about 3 weeks before Christmas. I wrapped it up for my son for Christmas and he opened it and the watch had no numbers on the face but would light up. He took it to a watch repair place and the owner was unable to repair. Waiting to hear back from the seller.

customer_reviews.title: Fake one
customer_reviews.text: I Buy the one sold by multibrand capital Fake Made un china Casio vintage, poor quality materials and cheap yellow color

customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this awesome watch. I was wearing fancy, expensive watches for a while but I love the simplicity of this one much more & the nostalgia.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect duo
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after wearing my A168W-1 so often! I think these two pieces go with any type of clothing (whether they are casual or business). Can't go wrong with the price and I would highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch

customer_reviews.title: Simple, easy, classic
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty straight forward advertised product. What you see is what you get. The face is about one inch wide, the gold is a bright yellow gold, the band is ready to adjust, and the settings on the watch are easy to figure out. Classic retro design.

customer_reviews.title: i love them all
customer_reviews.text: i have been collecting Cacio watches in years, i love them all..they fit so nice on my wrist and there's no problem at all.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality

customer_reviews.title: good but can be better condition

customer_reviews.title: Mostly man jewelry and it also tells time.
customer_reviews.text: Love these watches. It's mostly man jewelry and it also tells time.

When I tell them the price they are shocked because the watch looks very nice and flashy. This watch is versatile as it goes well with formal wear and everyday wear.

customer_reviews.title: great watch, just one problem.
customer_reviews.text: the band is stainless steel metal and you can tell right away. But the only problem and why i gave it four instead of five stars is i thought the the watch its self would be metal too, but, it's actually a hard plastic, invisible to the human eye but right away when examining it. Its amazing. i would buy another one if i ever had too.

I wore it every day, I got a lot of compliments on it every where I went with it on. Unfortunately the latch just broke on me the other day but I'm happy enough to go buy a new one (which I was planning on doing in May) I might buy one for my wife too. Highly recommend this watch

It's not too blingy but not too casual. Great for if you have an office job. I love that it's digital because let's get real if your under 30.... You are use to Reading digital time ! inlove with this ! Great buy !

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice with anything you have on and you'll never stop ...
customer_reviews.text: Very simple but lovely vintage watch. It looks nice with anything you have on and you'll never stop wearing it. I always take it to work and always get compliments on it. I wear it everyday and it's worth it.

customer_reviews.title: My sister asked where I bought and she ordered one ...
customer_reviews.text: My sister asked where I bought and she ordered one on the spot. Clean wrist wear. Just buy it if you thinking about it
